extends java.lang.Object

    • 方法详细资料

      • showPickPhotoDialog

        public static void showPickPhotoDialog(android.app.Activity act)
        fires a dialog that allows the user to choose from album or pick a photo with camera.
        参数:
        act - the activity the calls this function.

      • bitmapToUri

        public static android.net.Uri bitmapToUri(android.app.Activity act,
                                          android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        convert a bitmap to an URI by storing the bitmap to a temporary space.
        参数:
        act - the activity that calls this function.
        bitmap - the bitmap to be converted
        返回:
        a URI pointed to the temporary store location.

      • checkWriteExternalPermission

        public static boolean checkWriteExternalPermission(android.app.Activity act)
        check the external storage permission before proceeding. Should be used before storing the picture to a temporary location.
        参数:
        act - the Activity that calls this function
        返回:
        a boolean indicating if the permission is currently invoked.

      • checkCameraPermission

        public static boolean checkCameraPermission(android.app.Activity act)
        check the external storage permission before proceeding. Should be used before storing the picture to a temporary location.
        参数:
        act - the Activity that calls this function
        返回:
        a boolean indicating if the permission is currently invoked.
